title: Elevador (2013)
overview: Inside the elevators of the oldest multi-family residential building in Latin America, life goes by quickly. Bodies and stories crowd together in front of the elevator operators’ eyes in the small metal box. Elevator operators are spectators, guardians and confidants. They are the ones who know the living history of the buildings.
storyline: Inside the elevators of the oldest multifamily residential building in Latin America the life goes briefly. Bodies and stories crowd together in front of the elevators operators' eyes in the small metal box. Elevator operators are spectators, guardians and confidants. They are the ones who patiently know the living history of the buildings.
